Text.Value: *The creatures clutch the pouch possessively. You have no doubt: a spider egg is nestled within.*
Leave.
*Your fingers search, but find no bag. Was it a trick of the light?*

Text.Value: Dart your hand in once more, hoping to snatch the bag.
Dart your hand in, hoping to snatch the bag.

Text.Value: *The infuriated spiders pour in all directions like sand. The swarm is coming.*

Text.Value: *The creatures clutch the pouch possessively. Is gold so precious to spiders?*
Speak softly to the spiders in hopes of calming them.
